english.segment1: I want to come closer, but you are so distant. Lately your thoughts are so far. I want to show you all that youre missing. And Ill meet you right where you are.
english.segment2: Oh Love, Ive always known you. And, Oh Love, youve always been mine. Oh Love, Im only asking you for your life
english.segment3: Say that you need me, I know what youre feeling. You cannot do this alone. I gave you my Word, and I gave you my life. So that youll never be on your own
english.segment4: Youre waiting for this life to be what you want. (Is this what you wanted?). Youre waiting for this life to be what you need. (Is this what you needed?). Youre waiting for this life
